description.name: inrttrc20
description.tagline: INRT trc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto trc20-inrt Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept INRT trc20 directly on your website
Unique trc20/inrt receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your trc20/inrt wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
